objects.text:
• Digital LED Display with
   Intuitive Controls
• Multiple Wash & Dry Cycles for
   All Fabric Types
• Smart Features for Modern Lifestyle

Act Fast for Instant Luxury!
Unmissable Savings on Premium Appliances

product_details.name: INSIGNIA Modern Smart Washer & Dryer Set - Ultimate Laundry Solution
product_details.description:
• Digital LED Display with Intuitive Controls for Easy Operation
• Large Capacity Front-Loading Design for Efficient Washing & Drying
• Multiple Wash & Dry Cycles to Handle All Fabric Types
• Energy Efficient Performance with Modern Technology
• Sleek White Design with Black Accent Door
• Space-Saving Side-by-Side Configuration
• Advanced Temperature Control System
• Quick Wash & Dry Options Available
• Durable Construction with Premium Finish
• Smart Features for Modern Lifestyle
• Quiet Operation Technology
• Easy-Access Door Design with Large Opening

banner_details:
This banner features a modern advertising layout promoting a home appliance set. The left half of the banner contains a vibrant blue background with multiple text layers. The topmost large heading (`heading`) uses bold white font to highlight the promotional theme. Below it, a subheading (`subheading`) adds product detail emphasis. A small orange underline (`decorative_line`) separates the headline from a bulleted feature list (`description`). A strong orange label (`tagline`) announces urgency, followed by a bold white price (`price`). A call-to-action button (`cta_button_bg`) with contrasting text (`cta`) invites users to shop. Supporting fine print appears at the bottom (`disclaimer`). The right side features a product image (`product_image`), enhanced by dynamic orange dashed lines for visual rhythm.  

**Color Palette**:  
- Royal Blue: #0047AB  
- White: #FFFFFF  
- Orange: #FF5722  
- Light Blue (background): #F4F9FF  
- Gray accents in product image
product_color: The product image showcases a sleek, modern washer and dryer set with a minimalist white base (#FFFFFF) serving as the dominant tone. The round black doors stand out boldly, using a matte black color (#1A1A1A) that delivers strong contrast and visual focus. Transparent glass with subtle gradients of charcoal gray (#4B4B4B) and deeper blacks adds depth and realism. The control panels incorporate deep black backgrounds (#000000) with white (#FFFFFF) and soft blue (#00BFFF) LED display highlights, drawing attention to the interface. Silver metallic accents (#C0C0C0) on the knobs offer a touch of sophistication. These high-contrast tones balance functionality and elegance perfectly.
